## Procedures.allProcedures() function

Find all user-created procedure definitions in a workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function allProcedures(root: Workspace): any[][][];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  root | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | Root workspace.  Pair of arrays, the first contains procedures without return variables, the second with. Each procedure is defined by a three-element list of name, parameter list, and return value boolean.  Blockly.Procedures.allProcedures |

<b>Returns:</b>

any\[\]\[\]\[\]
